founder.title: Meet the Founder
founder.quote: I believe the future belongs to those who stay true to the right values. Hyper One is committed to ethical, responsible AI that creates real value for people.
founder.bio1: Lữ Minh Trí is the Co-Founder of AI Wiz Kids and SaDec X, two initiatives in AI-powered education and AI-driven agriculture. Before returning to Vietnam, he spent many years working in Japan and Singapore in roles that demanded systems thinking and disciplined execution, including Design Lead, Project Manager and Assistant to the Chairman at Futher Up (Oka Bain Japan). He later became the Founder and Country Director of Oka&Co Interior Singapore, where he built teams and delivered multiple design and technology projects across Southeast Asia. Over nearly a decade, he also traveled to more than 30 countries — from Europe to Pakistan, India, China, Indonesia and Malaysia — engaging in commercial negotiations and market exploration, which helped him develop a global perspective on business operations and growth models.
founder.bio2: His return to Vietnam marked the beginning of a new chapter, where he founded Hyper One with a mission to build AI platforms, cognitive automation systems and operational technologies focused on solving real business problems and structuring knowledge for the AI era. His international experience and strategic mindset shaped the philosophy of "AI for humanity," which guides Hyper One's commitment to ethical, responsible and practical AI applications. He is also the Co-Founder of DAS Institute, an Institute of Artificial Intelligence and Digital Strategy that brings together leading experts in technology, education, communications, finance, accounting and organizational management.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.subtitle: The journey from a small corner on Nguyen Hue to building AI with a Vietnamese soul.
ourStory.p1: Hyper One began in a small workspace at 68 Nguyen Hue, Ben Nghe — now Saigon Ward. A place where five people sat together sharing a vision for Vietnam’s AI future.
ourStory.p2: We had no launch event, no grand opening — only long workdays and endless conversations about one question: what should AI truly do for Vietnamese businesses?
ourStory.p3: In that room, Hyper Bot was tested for the first time. Hyper ME got its first lines of description. Hyper Cloud and Hyper Lab were drafted as rough ideas.
ourStory.p4: We grew the same way Vietnamese people always have: resilient, focused, and never complaining.
ourStory.p5: To this day, our first principle remains unchanged: build it right first, expand later.
ourStory.p6: This journey is only beginning. We continue building AI platforms shaped by Vietnamese values: simplicity, resilience, and human-centeredness.
ourStory.quote: Do not chase what AI can do — stay true to what AI should do.

compliance.title: International Compliance Standards
compliance.description: Hyper One adheres to four global ISO/IEC standards on privacy, cloud security, personal data protection, and responsible AI governance.

29100.title: ISO/IEC 29100 – Privacy Framework
29100.desc: Defines 11 global privacy principles for protecting personal data.

27017.title: ISO/IEC 27017 – Cloud Security Guidelines
27017.desc: Security controls designed specifically for cloud service providers and customers.

27018.title: ISO/IEC 27018 – PII Protection in Cloud
27018.desc: International standard for protecting personally identifiable information (PII) in cloud environments.

27557.title: ISO/IEC 27557 – Responsible AI Governance
27557.desc: Framework ensuring AI transparency, ethical alignment, and responsible governance.
